associated symptoms.reasoning: Grapefruit contains naturally occurring compounds like tyramine and certain flavonoids, which can influence neurotransmitter levels and may trigger headaches or migraines in sensitive individuals.

Grapefruit is high in soluble and insoluble fiber, particularly pectin. While fiber supports digestive health, excessive intake can lead to bloating and gas, especially in people with sensitive gastrointestinal systems or IBS.
